title: Running calendar for 9.29.15
text:
FLORIDA TODAY 8:58 a.m. EDT September 28, 2015 Buy Photo Take part in a local 5K to stay in shape and help some great causes. (Photo: FLORIDA TODAY file) Buy Photo 
Oct. 3 
Long Doggers Kids Marathon (2.62) and Half Marathon (1.31): 7:30 a.m., David R. Schechter Center, Satellite Beach 
Oct. 4 
Battle of the Bridge Triathlon: 7:15 a.m., Pineapple Park, Melbourne 
Oct. 10 
Witch Way 5K: 5:30 p.m., Nance Park, Indialantic 
Wild Shrimp Shuffle 5K & 10K: 7:45 a.m., Chain of Lakes Park, Titusville 
Oct. 17 
Jailbreak Brevard Adventure Race: 8 a.m., Brevard County Jail Complex, Sharpes 
Will Run for Chocolate, Won’t Stand for Violence 5K Walk/Run: 8 a.m., Space Coast Stadium 
Oct. 24 
Ghostly Gecko 5K: 6:30 p.m., Eau Gallie Civic Center, Melbourne (Running Zone Race Series Race) 
Oct. 25 
Cocoa Beach Half Marathon: 7:30 a.m., Shepard Park, Cocoa Beach 
Oct. 31 
Space Coast Crew Zombie Run: 5:30 p.m., Oars and Paddles Park, Indian Harbour Beach 
Don’t see your race here? Let us know. Email Tim Walters at twalters@floridatoday.com, and we’ll add your run to next week’s calendar. Registration information for the races available at runningzone.com and spacecoastrunners.org 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://on.flatoday.com/1KFrZMv TOP VIDEOS
